#endif 204 205 /* Used with DynamicLibrary to simplify importing functions from a win32 DLL. 206 207 dll: the DynamicLibrary object 208 functionName: function to import 209 localFunctionName: name you want to use to actually call it (must be different) 210 returnType: the return type 211 params: list of params (bracketed) 212 */ 213 #define __LOAD_WINAPI_FUNCTION(dll, functionName, localFunctionName, returnType, params) \ 214 typedef returnType (WINAPI *type##localFunctionName) params; \ 215 type##localFunctionName localFunctionName = (type##localFunctionName) dll.getFunction
